attributes.additional_details:
Pumpkin received injuries due to extreme trauma as a new born puppy. Her spine was broken, along with her legs. 
She was not born like this! Someone caused these injuries.
Pumpkin is now fully paralysed from the waist down. She will never recover or walk again. 
She is not in pain. She is trying to live a normal happy, puppy life without the use of her legs!

please sign this petition to support her cause and get justice to whoever did this.
attributes.background: I want Justice For Pumpkin.  Tougher laws for animal cruelty & breeding.

rejection.details:
It's really clear that you want better treatment for your dog, but it's not clear what you'd like the Government to do. Petitions have to have a clear ask for the Government. 

You might want to sign a petition like this one: 

Toughen animal welfare laws & introduce an animal abuser's database
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598610
